llm_res.rule: Approval event MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
transferFrom: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
Transfer event MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
